text: How to leave without hurting anybodyIt s going to be almost one month since my ex boyfriend dumped me  Out of the blue  I cannot blame  or fault him for this  He was unhappy  He wanted to date other women  I was not enough  The break up honestly solidified what I suspected all along  That I am unworthy of love and kindness  and that I should stop pretending to be otherwise After the break up  I lashed out and said things to my ex that made him entertain thoughts of harming himself  It was not my intention to do so  and now I feel extremely terrible about it  He told me I used my training  I m a clinical psych grad student  to drive him over the edge  I m a terrible person  Never did I see myself capable of doing this to another person  Not only did I hurt him  but I must have hurt his loved ones too   I have been entertaining thoughts about killing myself months before the break up  but now that I have nothing to lose  it seems like the perfect opportunity  I feel my death will do everyone a favor  But my mom insists she will never get over my death  I told her it will get easier as the day goes by  Honestly  I just want to leave without making anyone feel hurt and betrayed  but they want me alive   Judging by my actions  I feel like I don t deserve to be alive  I am afraid I will only keep hurting people  And if I die  I will continue to hurt people  I know I should not care anymore  but I just want my mom and my sister to accept that I just want to be at peace  Or free from the emotional hell I ve been in for the longest time

text: I m so tired of this throwaway for obvious reasons   School starts next week  It s my last full semester of college and I m excited to be done but as day   approaches  I m overwhelmed with the cost of textbooks  the impending state of constant stress  the workload  the pressure to balance work and classes   I m trying to get licensed to sell insurance part time so I can leave my shitty retail job  but I barely have time to study for the exam right now  I m already anticipating receiving a failing grade for the exam and having to tell my boyfriend and parents that I didn t get the job  already feeling like a failure  I still have my shitty retail job but I know that I m going to explode if I have to work there much longer   And then there s the anxiety about my future career  What if I m not a good teacher  What if my students don t succeed  What if I m having a bad mental health day and it affects my students  What if a student comes to me for help with their own mental health problems and I can t help them because I m already overwhelmed with my own   Just everything is too much  too exhausting  I m fucking tired  I don t want to dump this on my boyfriend because he already has so much of his own shit going on in his own life and I don t want to add to it  Plus it can be hard explaining rationalizing my feelings and anxieties and stresses to someone else  I m scared that no one s going to understand how I feel  no one s going to listen to me  no one s going to say anything other than  you got this  just don t give up  or some bullshit like that  I ve been trying not to give up for over a decade now  I m tired and I want to be done   Sorry for ranting  thank you for reading
summary: The last semester of college is coming to an end. She is overwhelmed with the cost of textbooks, the workload, the stress, the pressure to balance work and classes and her future career. She doesn't want to talk about it with her boyfriend as he already has a lot of stress.
cleaned: semester college come end overwhelmed cost textbook workload stress pressure balance work class future career not want talk boyfriend lot stress
